str2: A festival assembly. From pas and a derivative of agora; a mass-meeting, i.e. universal companionship.
From a compound of ek and a derivative of kaleo; a calling out, i.e. a popular meeting, especially a religious congregation.
First-born, eldest. From protos and the alternate of tikto; first-born.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: From apo and grapho; to write off, i.e. Enrol.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Perhaps from the same as oros; the sky; by extension, heaven; by implication, happiness, power, eternity; specially, the Gospel.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
A judge, magistrate, ruler. From krino; a judge.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
From dike; equitable; by implication, innocent, holy.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: From teleios; to complete, i.e. accomplish, or consummate.
